turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Could you do me a favor and order a large pizza for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. From which pizza place?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Dominos.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many large pizzas do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one large pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. And what do you want on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pepperoni and salami. And can I change the tomato sauce for their garlic sauce?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, that is one of their sauce options. Do you want to pick it up or order for delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pick it up on my way home.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. There are two Dominos. Which one do you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on FM78 is closest to my house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Do you want to know the specials or just the pizza? Any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Just the one pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. I will order it now. You can either hold on or I can text you the details.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will hold on the line. I'm driving now so I don't want to text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh, what kind of crust do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The hand tossed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, one large hand tossed pepperoni and salami with garlic sauce instead of tomato sauce, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's all ordered. It will be ready for pick-up in 25 minutes. They will send the receipt to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Bye.
